channel.title: DUC v2.2.1
channel.description: Alrighty. So I'm making a server of my own. I am reading the tutorial, and one of the steps is to go to np-ip.org, make an account, make a no-ip thingy. So I made irishscape.no-ip.info. Then it asked me to download DUC v2.2.1. So I downloaded it and installed it with no problems, and I entered my email and password. Then when it logged me in, it says Checking Remote IP Address. It has been doing this for an hour now. Am I doing something wrong? :(

item.title: DUC v2.2.1
item.dc:creator: @Prince_Conr Prince Conr
item.description:
@Prince_Conr wrote:

I don’t have MSN, I’m sorry. I can get it really quickly if you want me to though.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 01, 2006, 02:16:16 PM[/size][hr]I’m downloading it now. It’ll be done in just a minute. Meanwhile, I’ll see if I know how to disable a firewall, which I doubt I do =/[br][size=1]Posted at: November 01, 2006, 02:17:59 PM[/size][hr]I’ll be back in just a minute, I’m going to restart my computer.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 01, 2006, 02:21:45 PM[/size][hr]I went into Windows Security Center, it says that the Firewall is off. But I also have Norton Antivirus, could that maybe be affecting it?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 01, 2006, 02:27:07 PM[/size][hr]I got MSN now. Lemme add you.[br][size=1]Posted at: November 01, 2006, 02:32:59 PM[/size][hr]It says your offline on MSN.

item.title: DUC v2.2.1
item.dc:creator: @Prince_Conr Prince Conr
item.description:
@Prince_Conr wrote:

Well, I’m not very good with computers I don’t know how to post a screen shot, but I’ll describe it. The window is called No-IP DUC v2.2.1. It says Account used for updates: myemailishere. Then there is an Edit button but it is grayed out so that I cannot click it. Below that, it says To submit a bug/suggestion please click here and fill out the form. Below that, it says Please check the hosts that you wanted udpates, checks take effect immediately. Below that, there is a box. Inside the box it says -Groups- and -Hosts-, nothing else. Below the box, it says Updating to IP: Checking… Then there is the FAQ Button, and a grayed out Options button that I can’t click. Below that is a big box that just says [Wed 12:05] Checking Remote IP Address.

Okay, that’s everything that is there. Do you have any idea what could be wrong?

Read full topic
